title: Housekeeper Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Evergreens Foundation (Moorestown, NJ) in Aug 2012
Interview Descriptions: I walked into a very clean, well groomed environment. I was greeted at the front desk. I was then directed to HR.The interview went smooth. They don't make you feel nervous.  They pay for your employment process.   As well as give you, uniforms, shoes, lunch bags.
Interview Questions: What made you apply for The evergreens?
